text:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/configure-edge-with-intune 
Computer configuration
Administrative templates
Windows components
Microsoft Edge 
^ old Edge, the original version. 
Install the policies I've provided the link for to manage Edge (chromium based).
Or as I did ^, download the admx files, view in notepad++ and script\whatever
the reg keys to manually do stuff.

metadata.topic: Re: Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
